featureFlags.description: Current UI Config Version
featureFlags.name: UI_CONFIG_VERSION

featureFlags.description: Message to be displayed during the maintenance on Applicant Portal
featureFlags.name: MAINTENANCE_MSG_SYSTEM_UI_APPLICANT_PORTAL
featureFlags.value:
Credential Verification for Healthcare Professionals Unavailable ##timeRangeStr##.

Due to scheduled maintenance, the Credential Verification for Healthcare Professionals is expected to be unavailable beginning at approximately ##startTimestampStr##. The application is expected to be restored by ##endTimestampStr##. All times are calculated using Eastern Time in the United States. Thank you for your patience and cooperation as we work to maintain high-quality on-line services.

featureFlags.description: Message to be displayed when the maintenance is impending on Applicant Portal
featureFlags.name: MAINTENANCE_MSG_IMPENDING_UI_APPLICANT_PORTAL

Due to scheduled maintenance, the Credential Verification for Healthcare Professionals Portal is expected to be unavailable beginning at approximately ##startTimestampStr##. The application is expected to be restored by ##endTimestampStr##. All times are calculated using Eastern Time in the United States. Thank you for your patience and cooperation as we work to maintain high-quality on-line services.
